resources.string: Welcome to Fill the Grid! Fill the grid below with all the same colour in as few moves as possible. Good luck!

When you press on any button, all the vertically and horizontally neighbouring buttons will change to the colour of the pressed button. If you press on a button which is in a group of buttons which are all the same colour, the buttons surrounding it will be changed in the same fashion.
